body: Hye @jdolitsky where are we with this?
IIRC @stevvooe mentioned that there is a library in containerd that abstracts this away. I have no idea if it'll work alongside your XDG_HOME/CONFIG PR, though.
Thanks for the heads up @jzelinskie! I'll do some digging in containerd and see what comes up.

Hi, hoping to have this land upstream in ORAS early next week.

removing from the beta milestone as #6185 has been PR'd, which means this discussion can move forward without blocking the release.

issue.title: Helm 3 - OCI: Use alt destination for chart export etc.

labels.name: size/M
labels.description: Denotes a PR that changes 30-99 lines, ignoring generated files.

labels.name: v3.x
labels.description: Issues and Pull Requests related to the major version v3

issue.body:
Some small updates here related to OCI work. Still making progress on another branch to address #6068 and #6185, hoping to land pre-beta..

The adds the -d flag to "helm chart export" to save chart to different directory (was previously a TODO).

Also some other miscellaneous things:

- allow loading with "helm chart save" from both dir and tarball, using `Load()` method vs. `LoadDir()`
- Switch experimental error to `Please set HELM_EXPERIMENTAL_FEATURE=1 ... ` to be more copy-paste friendly

issue.title: ref(internal/experimental/registry): pkg refactor

labels.name: size/XXL
labels.description: Denotes a PR that changes 1000+ lines, ignoring generated files.

labels.name: v3.x
labels.description: Issues and Pull Requests related to the major version v3

issue.body:
No more magic separating the metadata from chart tarball - charts are pushed to registry as a single tarball layer with Chart.yaml in tact.

No more fragile custom symlink chart storage, now following the OCI Image Layout Specification for chart filesystem cache.

Also:
- Update to ORAS 0.6.0
- Simplify registry client setup with NewClientWithDefaults()
- Remove needless annotations and constants

Fixes #6068
Fixes #6141
